Improvements.Description: Assertions are typically used for debugging. In production code, they might be turned off, so they shouldn't be used for any critical checks. The assertions used in this method seem to be checking for conditions that should always be satisfied, so they are not necessary and can be removed.

Improvements.Change_Diff: This change involves extracting repeated logic into separate methods, which is not easily represented in a git diff. Refer to the 'Final code' for the updated method structure.
Improvements.Description: The code blocks for DOUBLES_SKETCH, FLOATS_SKETCH, and default case have repeated logic. We can extract this logic into separate methods to maintain DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself) principle.
